title: MSFT_rigid_bodies glTF extension
description: Parameters describing how a node's transform should be driven by physics simulation.

isKinematic.description: If enabled, the object effectively has infinite mass. It's velocity will remain constant during physics simulation.

centerOfMass.description: The center of mass of the object in local space.

inertiaDiagonal.description: The principal moments of inertia.  Larger values imply the rigid body is harder to rotate.

inertiaOrientation.description: The rotation quaternion rotating from inertia major axis space to body space.

linearVelocity.description: The initial linear velocity of the object.

angularVelocity.description: The initial angular velocity of the object.

gravityFactor.description: A multiplier applied to the global acceleration due to gravity.
